statements: SELECT * FROM medical_device_events
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM medical_device_events
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM medical_device_events WHERE device_id = 123
SELECT * FROM medical_device_events WHERE event_type = 'Maintenance'
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM medical_device_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM medical_device_events WHERE event_type = 'Alert' AND event_date <= '2021-10-31';
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM medical_device_events WHERE device_id = 1001 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM medical_device_events WHERE device_id = 2002 AND event_date >= '2021-09-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM medical_device_events WHERE event_type LIKE '%Failure%' AND device_id IN (3003, 4004) LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM medical_device_events GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_events > 10 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_id, event_type, timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message, event_type FROM alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE event_type = 'Critical' OR event_type = 'Warning';
SELECT recipient, status, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, event_type, message FROM alerts WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT alert_id, recipient FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, event_type, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE id < 10;
SELECT * FROM medical_device_alerts;
SELECT device_id, alert_type FROM medical_device_alerts WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT device_id, alert_timestamp FROM medical_device_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Pacemaker';
SELECT log_id, notification_type, notification_message, recipient_email FROM notification_logs WHERE notification_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM medical_device_alerts WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Wearable';
SELECT notification_type, notification_timestamp FROM notification_logs ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_device_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND resolved = FALSE;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM device_info WHERE device_name LIKE 'Insu%';
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT alert_id, action_taken, responsible_user FROM alerts_history ORDER BY history_timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM alerts_history INNER JOIN users ON alerts_history.responsible_user = users.user_id;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE device_type IN ('Smartphone', 'Tablet') AND manufacturer != 'Samsung';
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM CriticalEvents;
SELECT device_name, device_location, device_status FROM Devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT notification_text, notification_timestamp FROM Notifications WHERE notification_status = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, alert_threshold, notification_method, notification_frequency FROM UserSettings;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM CriticalEvents WHERE severity_level > 3 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT device_name, device_location, device_status FROM Devices WHERE device_status = TRUE ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT notification_text, notification_timestamp FROM Notifications WHERE notification_status = FALSE ORDER BY notification_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role IN ('admin', 'manager') ORDER BY user_name ASC;
